description: Su-Swastha Yojna provides cashless health insurance for residents of Sikkim, covering hospitalization and critical illnesses.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families not covered under other health schemes

steps: Register at empanelled hospital or health centers

special_notes: Focus on uncovered families in Sikkim
